atk_abil: Normal Attack : Attacks enemy units by shooting a number of long-range missiles and stuns them for a certain period of time.
Skill Attack : Lures enemy units to attack the robot by summoning a robot. ( Only lures air units and ranged units. )
Special Ability 1 : Also targets and attacks ground melee units. ( Targets and attacks both melee and ranged units. )
Special Ability 2 : Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%. ( If double speed is applied, the game speed increases by 2.04x cumulatively )
Special Ability 3 : Increases the HP and defense power of all units by 2%.

Spirit Awakening : Maximum level-up increases by 5 for all units. ( [Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop. )

buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases for all units even if Pilot is in the Time Shop. (5-star 5 levels, 6-star 10 levels, Max 100 levels).
